original_text: You have helped the other tribes for a long time now. You have stayed with them even until today. You have done all the work that the Lord your God gave you to do.
korean_text: 오늘까지 날이 오래도록 너희가 너희 형제를 떠나지 아니하고 오직 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 명령하신 그 책임을 지키도다

sentences.original_text: You have helped the other tribes
You have done all the work
that the Lord your God gave you to do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 주 하나님이 당신에게 하라고 주신 모든 일
